segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen, and frankly, I'm quite taken aback.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is literally overflowing, just dumping water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, she's standing right in it, wiping a plate!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can you not feel water sloshing around your feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a complete mess, water damage is definitely happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then, you have these kids, attempting some sort of cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so high up on that rickety stool, it's terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing just seems incredibly irresponsible to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to pay attention and clean this up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can practically hear the water dripping and splashing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire scene is making me feel quite uncomfortable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an absolute chaotic display of domestic negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing breaks or nobody gets hurt in this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a truly awful situation this has become.
segments.speaker: PAR
